official_title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of certain telescopes not designed for use with infra-red light.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty-free treatment of telescopic sights for rifles valued at not over $50 and of other types of telescopic sights valued at not over $200. Provides staged rate reductions for other types of telescopic sights valued at over $200.

titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of certain telescopes not designed for use with infra-red light.
